then.line: Okay this one I definitely know.
It's butts!
For the third piece of your prophecy, you have chosen to submit...
Butts.
Yeah, you finally gave me a riddle I can understand!
...Very well. If this is your final answer, the work is done.
Your prophecy is...
Oooh, I can't wait!
Okay this one must be...
I know! A newborn baby! Full of warm and potential and chubby little elbows and knees.
No edges on a baby!
Your answer of "A newborn baby" has been acknowledged.
The prophecy is complete. Are you ready to hear it?
I've never been more ready! Minty here I come!
The prophecy is...
Get ready, pal! I've got this one...on LOCK.
Because the answer is celestial bodies locked in their endless dance! Boom!
Just call me Queen Riddle!
I will not call you by this name.
But I will acknowledge your response. And allow it to complete the prophecy.
Yesss! It's Minty-findin' time!
Your prophecy is...
